meanings.definition: One of ten equal parts of a whole.
meanings.sent1: In the pizza party, each person got one of the tenths of the cake.
meanings.sent2: She divided the chocolate bar into tenths to share with her friends.
meanings.sent3: The tenths of the pie were so tiny, they looked like little crumbs.
meanings.sent4: His heart was broken into tenths, each piece representing a different memory.
meanings.sent5: The tenths of the rainbow shone brightly in the sky.

meanings.definition: The position of a number in the decimal system one place to the right of the decimal point.
meanings.sent1: The number 3.7 has 7 in the tenths place.
meanings.sent2: When working with decimals, it's important to understand the concept of tenths.
meanings.sent3: The tenths place in the math problem seemed to be playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts floated around like numbers in the tenths place, never quite settling.
meanings.sent5: The tenths spot on the ruler helped in measuring the length accurately.
